overview_of_class: Students will learn how the Israeli economy developed from a barren socialist country to a thriving, high-tech, net-exporting economy. What were the key developments and policies that helped to bring about this transition, and what are the challenges facing the Israeli society today. At the end of this course, it is hoped that students will not only have better understanding of the Israeli economy and society, but will also develop better research skills and practice critical thinking.
name: The Israeli Economy
subject: JWSH_ST
